snippet: Even in their first week, summer analysts are already discovering the delights and frustrations of their chosen line of work. | Elan has had to get creative in order to challenge a hostile bid from Royalty Pharma. | A debate is growing in Britain...
abstract: Even in their first week, summer analysts are already discovering the delights and frustrations of their chosen line of work. | Elan has had to get creative in order to challenge a hostile bid from Royalty Pharma. | A debate is growing in Britain over what to do with bailed-out banks. | Raymond Lane, the former chairman of Hewlett-Packard, faces a tax headache.

headline.main: Through the Eyes of Wall Street Interns
